signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LL: S. Rothenberg 85–86
text: Rothenberg's tour de force among her many figurative prints, Stumblebum blurs the line between drawing and printmaking. This monumental lithograph of 1985-86 was produced from 12 separate color plates in black, grey, silver and pink.
title: Stumblebum
